content: (The following statement was released by the rating agency) LONDON/CHICAGO  October 14 (Fitch) Fitch Ratings has affirmed Prudential Plc's  (Prudential) Long-term Issuer Default Rating (IDR) at 'A+' and senior unsecured  debt at 'A'. The agency has also affirmed Prudential Assurance Company Ltd's  (PAC) Insurer Financial Strength (IFS) rating at 'AA'.  At the same time  Fitch has affirmed Prudential's US subsidiaries Jackson  National Life Insurance Company and Jackson National Life Insurance Co
name: Prudential Public Limited Company
title: Fitch Affirms Prudential Plc's IDR at 'A+'; Outlook Stable
